name: Puppy Chef Academy (itch)
description:
Dear Yuu,

Congratulations! The prestigious Puppy Chef Academy is pleased to inform you that you have passed the preliminary round of applications. To evaluate your potential as a future student here, we would like to ask you to come in for an entrance exam.

Please make your way to the academy to take your exam. You may arrive any time you wish, we'll be eagerly awaiting your arrival!

Best of luck to you, we look forward to seeing you soon!

Best regards,
- Georgia, Dean of Puppy Chef Academy

Puppy Chef Academy is a Virtual Reality game that blends cooking games with visual novel elements to create a story about Yuu, a kitten that's been accepted to study culinary arts at an all-puppy culinary academy. 

In this game, you will be tasked with completing the school's entrance exam. Along the way, you will meet the various residents of the academy as you crack eggs, fry bacon, and flip omelettes.

We hope you enjoy playing Puppy Chef Academy as much as we enjoyed creating it!

A play space of at least 2 meters by 2 meters is recommended, but is playable with a standing / sitting setup as well.

Join the Puppy Chef Academy community!
